samples.instruction: Calculator/Mathematical tables exam-à®²à¯ allowed-à®†?
samples.current_output: Depends on exam: Board exams (10th, 12th): Not allowed. NEET: Not allowed. JEE: Virtual calculator on screen only. Engineering semester: Usually allowed (non-programmable). CA/CMA: Specific models allowed. GATE: Virtual calculator. SSC/Banking: Not allowed. Mathematical tables: Some exams provide, some allow bringing. Always check: Admit card instructions. Penalty for unauthorized items: Disqualification possible.

samples.instruction: Engineering padicha piragu job kedaikkalaye, enna seiyalam?
samples.current_output: Kedaikkum, konjam time agum. Options: 1) Skill upgrade - Python, Data Science courses 2) GATE ezhudhu - PSU jobs, ME admission 3) Government jobs - SSC JE, RRB 4) Freelancing start pannu 5) Startup try pannu - PMEGP loan irukku. Tirupur, Coimbatore industry hub - networking pannu. Patience venum.

samples.instruction: Oru school-la irundhu innooru school-ku TC eppadi vaanguvadhu?
samples.current_output:
**Transfer Certificate (TC) Process:**

**Step 1:** Written application to Headmaster with reason

**Step 2:** Clear dues - Library books, Fees, ID card

**Step 3:** TC Issue
- Govt: 3-7 days (Free)
- Private: 7-15 days (â‚¹100-500)

**TC Contains:** Name, DOB, Class, Conduct, Medium, Community

**New School Admission:** TC + Marksheets + Aadhaar + Community certificate

**TC Refused?** Complain to DEO (District Education Officer)

samples.instruction: Law padippu (LLB) Tamil Nadu-la eppadi seruvathu?
samples.current_output: Two ways: 1) 5-year BA LLB (+2 passed students-ku) - CLAT/TNDALU entrance exam 2) 3-year LLB (graduates-ku). Dr. Ambedkar Law University counselling nadathum. CLAT score pala colleges-la accept aagum. Govt college fee: â‚¹5,000-15,000/year.

samples.instruction: Defence force join aaga training enge kidaikkum?
samples.current_output: Defence training options: 1) Sainik Schools - Class 6 admission (for NDA prep) 2) Army rally coaching - District soldiers boards 3) NDA coaching - Government free centers 4) Agnipath training - TNSDC centers 5) Private coaching institutes. Physical fitness: Running, pull-ups, sit-ups practice daily. Written exam: Maths, English, GK. Medical: Strict standards. Apply: www.joinindianarmy.nic.in. Age: 17.5-21 (varies by entry).

samples.instruction: PMEGP loan-à®•à¯à®•à¯ à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ apply à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®µà®¤à¯?
samples.current_output: Prime Minister's Employment Generation Programme: Manufacturing-à®•à¯à®•à¯ â‚¹50 lakh, Service-à®•à¯à®•à¯ â‚¹20 lakh à®µà®°à¯ˆ. Subsidy: General 15-25%, SC/ST/Women 25-35%. Process: 1) www.kviconline.gov.in-à®²à¯ register 2) Business plan submit 3) Bank verification 4) Loan sanction 5) EDP training (mandatory) 6) Disbursement. Age: 18+. Education: 8th pass (â‚¹10 lakh+), any (â‚¹10 lakh à®µà®°à¯ˆ). District Industries Centre-à®²à¯ help available.

samples.instruction: Orphan/single parent children-ku padippu udhavi enna?
samples.current_output: Benefits: 1) Social Welfare Department scholarship 2) Free education in government schools 3) Hostel facility free 4) PM CARES for Children scheme (COVID orphans) - â‚¹10 lakh insurance + monthly stipend + free education till graduation 5) NGO scholarships. Required: Death certificate of parent(s), income certificate. District Social Welfare Officer-a anugugal.

samples.instruction: TNPSC-à®•à¯à®•à¯ Tamil medium vs English medium - à®à®¤à¯ better?
samples.current_output: Both equal opportunity. Tamil medium advantages: 1) TN textbooks Tamil-à®²à¯ à®ªà®Ÿà®¿à®•à¯à®•à®²à®¾à®®à¯ 2) Answer writing easier 3) More candidates. English medium advantages: 1) Reference books availability 2) Current affairs sources more. Reality: Language doesn't matter, content matters. Toppers in both mediums. Choose your comfortable language. Paper can be written in either, no preference given. Focus on preparation, not medium.

samples.instruction: Single parent/orphan students-ku enna scholarship?
samples.current_output: Support schemes: 1) AICTE Swanath Scholarship - â‚¹50,000/year orphans-ku 2) PM CARES for Children (COVID orphans) - full support till graduation 3) Social Welfare Department orphan scholarship 4) NGO support - SOS Children's Villages, Udayan Care. Documents: Parent death certificate, guardian affidavit. Priority in government hostel admission. Apply through respective department.

samples.instruction: à®‰à®£à¯à®®à¯ˆà®¯à®¾ à®ªà¯Šà®¯à¯à®¯à®¾: Myth: Drop year waste of time, stigma à®‰à®³à¯à®³à®¤à¯
samples.current_output: à®‰à®£à¯à®®à¯ˆ: Fact: Drop year = Strategic investment. Many IIT/AIIMS toppers took drop. Reality: 60-70% NEET qualifiers are droppers. No employer asks about gap year for doctors/engineers. Better to take time and get right career than settle for less. Productive drop year > Rushed wrong decision. Society's opinion < Your career satisfaction.

samples.instruction: Coaching illaamal JEE crack panna mudiyumaa?
samples.current_output: Possible but challenging. Self-study success factors: 1) Strong self-discipline 2) Proper study plan 3) Quality resources - YouTube (Physics Wallah, Unacademy free), NPTEL 4) Regular mock tests 5) Doubt clearing - online forums, Telegram groups. Advantages: Own pace, cost saving. Challenges: Motivation, structured approach, peer competition. Hybrid approach: Free online + self-study works well. Many toppers are self-study students.

samples.instruction: SC/ST students-ku ennenna scholarships kidaikkum?
samples.current_output: Adi Dravidar Welfare Department: 1) Pre-matric scholarship - â‚¹500-1,500/year 2) Post-matric scholarship - â‚¹3,000-10,000/year 3) Professional course - full fee + maintenance 4) PhD scholarship 5) Foreign study - â‚¹20 lakh 6) Free laptop 7) Hostel free 8) Books, uniform free. Apply: www.adwelfare.tn.gov.in. Income limit: â‚¹2.5 lakh/year. Almost all courses-ku scholarship irukku.

samples.instruction: Polytechnic-à®²à¯ à®à®¨à¯à®¤ branch select à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®µà®¤à¯? Job opportunity à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿?
samples.current_output: Branch wise opportunities: 1) Mechanical - Manufacturing, automobile companies 2) Civil - Construction, PWD, real estate 3) Electrical - TNEB, industries, electrician 4) Electronics - IT companies, telecom 5) Computer Science - Software, IT support 6) Automobile - Service centers, companies. Highest demand: Mechanical, Civil. Growing: Computer Science. Government jobs: TNPSC Diploma level posts available.

samples.instruction: Student budget eppadi manage panrathu?
samples.current_output: Budget tips: 1) Monthly expenses list make 2) Essentials first - food, transport, stationery 3) Track spending - apps like Money Manager 4) Hostel food cheaper than outside 5) Second-hand books - seniors, book banks 6) Student discounts use everywhere 7) Part-time work if possible 8) Avoid peer pressure spending 9) Emergency fund small amount keep 10) Scholarship money wise use. Rule: Needs > Wants.

samples.instruction: Exam hall-la tension vandhaal enna seivathu?
samples.current_output: Tension relief tips: 1) Deep breathing - 10 murai moochu vidunga 2) Easy questions mudhalil attempt 3) Stuck aanaal skip, later return 4) Water kudiyunga 5) Positive self-talk: 'Naan padiththirukkiren, ezhudha mudiyum' 6) Question paper muzhuvathum mudhalil padiyunga. Before exam: Proper sleep, light food, early arrival. Severe panic: Invigilator-ku sollunga, rest room break.

samples.instruction: Employment Exchange-la register seivathu worth-aa?
samples.current_output: Benefits: 1) Government job notifications 2) Seniority based on registration date 3) Free career guidance 4) Skill training opportunities 5) Private job placement 6) Self-employment scheme guidance. Register: District Employment Office with certificates. Renewal: Every year or seniority lost. Documents: Educational certificates, community certificate, Aadhaar. Online renewal available now. Some government jobs require Employment Exchange registration.

samples.instruction: Student bank account open panrathu eppadi?
samples.current_output: Student account: 1) Zero balance accounts - SBI, Indian Bank offer 2) Documents: Aadhaar, college ID, photo, address proof 3) Benefits: ATM card, mobile banking, UPI 4) Scholarship DBT requires bank account 5) Education loan same bank = easier 6) Joint account option with parent 7) Fixed deposit for savings. Important: Keep minimum balance if required, avoid bounce charges. Link Aadhaar for DBT.

samples.instruction: Hotel Management padippu Tamil Nadu-la enge ulladhu?
samples.current_output: Top institutes: 1) IHM Chennai - Central Government 2) IHM Guruvayur - Private 3) SIHM Madurai - State 4) SRM Hotel School. Admission: NCHM JEE entrance + counselling. Eligibility: 12th pass 45-50%. Duration: 3 years BSc HM. Fees: Govt â‚¹50,000-80,000/year, Private â‚¹1-3 lakh/year. Jobs: Hotels, airlines, cruise ships, resorts. Good starting salary: â‚¹20,000-35,000.

samples.instruction: NEET exam-ku ready aaga enna seiyandumay?
samples.current_output: NCERT Biology, Physics, Chemistry - line by line read pannu/pannunga. Free coaching: Government centres-la apply pannu through school. Online free: YouTube (Physics Wallah), SWAYAM. 7.5% reservation govt school students-ku. Daily 6-8 hours padikka venum. Previous year papers practice important.

samples.instruction: India-la padippuku education loan eppadi vaanguvadhu?
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) Admission letter vaangunga 2) Bank-la application 3) Documents submit (mark sheets, fee structure, income proof) 4) Loan sanction 5) College-ku direct disbursement. Up to â‚¹4 lakh - no collateral. â‚¹4-7.5 lakh - third party guarantee. Above â‚¹7.5 lakh - property collateral. Interest subsidy available for EWS.
